word:
I am bidden to say to the church and to the whole world that unprincipled devising is being carried on. Robbery is being committed, 
                                                                           4
and men say, I was given authority to do this thing. Who gave you this authority? and who urged you on in the course that for years you have been pursuing?--It was the father of rebellion, that the cause of God should stand before the world imposed upon and plundered by unprincipled, designing actions.
